#library
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggmap)
```

#station
```{r}
#registering api
register_google(key = "AIzaSyDD3nNMrtxM9Q1TCYMUCBqXpNQD-xSWEoI", write = TRUE)

#loading station
stations <- read_excel("C:/Users/rakib/Desktop/Thesis/DATA/hurricane/weather/station_metadata.xlsx")
colnames(stations)
stations$address <- mapply(function(lat, lon) {
  tryCatch({
    revgeocode(c(lon, lat), output = "address", source = "google")
  }, error = function(e) NA)
}, stations$Latitude, stations$Longitude)

```
